input.sentences: over the weekend we decided to go to a casino .
the ladies walking around the casino were dressed very nicely .
the craps table was extremely fun and i made over $ 100 playing it .
rolling the dice was one of best parts about playing the craps table .
my friend and i got tired of gambling and decided to get drinks .
